Text:
This torrent works with Opel / Vauxhall DVD90 systems! I read about older version being compatible, tried that one and it works.

BMW DVD is easier to find, but it works just fine in Opel. You will have to record as dual-layer.

(note it's DVD90 compatible and not CD70)

Just forgotten to say that another BMW navigation called "BMW Navigation DVD Road Map Europe BUSINESS" doesn't work with Opel. 

Only the one named "BMW Road Map HIGH" is compatible.
I get CD ERROR when i put DVD in, any clue ?
do i have to burn it on a dual layer dvd if i am going to use it on a bmw?
It works on my X3 year 2004. Burned on DVD DL +R at 1x speed with ImgBurn
Tried this on a 2006 X3, didn't work. Anyone have ideas why?

works perfect.
Burned on DVD DL +R verbatim at 1x speed with ImgBurn
